actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Education, Arts, Humanities.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Education, Arts and Humanities

official_title: A bill to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to provide a program of parental choice and open enrollment in public schools.
short_title: Parental Choice and Open Enrollment in Public Schools Act

summary.text: Parental Choice and Open Enrollment in Public Schools Act - Schools of Choice Act of 1989 - Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to establish a program of grants to local and intermediate education agencies for Schools of Choice to promote open enrollment through parental choice in public schools. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1991 through 1993 for such purpose.

titles.title: Parental Choice and Open Enrollment in Public Schools Act
A bill to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to provide a program of parental choice and open enrollment in public schools.
